name: Acorn-A-Thon
storyline: Our adorable fox hero, Jark, embarks on an exciting journey in the lush, enchanting forest – his home! But dark clouds loom as the evil, acorn-gobbling pumpkins plot to starve the majestic trees, inhibiting their ability to sprout anew. This isn’t just a fight for acorns; it’s a battle for survival, for the forest is the lifeblood of Jark, his family, and his furry friends.
summary: ACORN-A-THON: Join Jark in the Ultimate Nutty Adventure! Save the Forest, Save the Future!
